ygData.subject: Lord Grimrot
ygData.msgSnippet: He is a very high level shadowknight, able to cut down characters in the 20 s with a few blows.  I have not personally seen him, but everyone tells me he
ygData.messageBody:
He is a very high level shadowknight, able to cut down characters in the
20's with a few blows. I have not personally seen him, but everyone tells
me he spawns in the skeleton field just south of the noth to south karana
bridge. Whether or not Grimrot is hostile to sk's remains to be seen. I
personally think he is friendly to human sk's at least, becuase I have been
given a quest to deliver a dwarven skull to him so that he may create an
undead warrior. I have visited the field many times, but still have not
seen him. If anyone knows if the spawn is triggered by an event please
reply.
